Commands.Northswain's Glow: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Magical Attack Up for 5 turns.
Commands.Heaven's Wrath: 10-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Physical Attack Up and Small Max BRV Up for 5 turns.  Deals an HP attack after BRV hits if STR 60 Passive Ability is equipped.
Commands.Maelstrom's Bolt: 5-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%.  Grants Dynast King's Bloodline for 6 turns.  Dynast King's Bloodline raises Max BRV and Attack.

Passives.Northswain's Glow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Northswain's Glow.
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Heaven's Wrath Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Heaven's Wrath.
Passives.Northswain's Glow Charge: Increases the max uses of Northswain's Glow by 1.
Passives.Break Supply: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after an ally breaks an enemy.
Passives.Heaven's Wrath Charge: Increases the max uses of Heaven's Wrath by 1.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Princess's Pride: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV of all allies when HP is under 50%.
Passives.Buff Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Northswain's Glow Extend: Increases the max uses of Northswain's Glow by 1.When using Northswain's Glow:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Slightly improves Magical Attack Up.- Triggers an HP attack after use.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed All: Moderately raises party's Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Heaven's Wrath Extend: Increases the max uses of Heaven's Wrath by 1.When using Heaven's Wrath:- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Slightly improves Physical Attack Up.- Slightly improves Max BRV Up and grants it to all allies.- Moderately improves Max BRV Up granted to self.- Triggers an HP attack after use.After using Heaven's Wrath:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns.- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency increase.

Weapons.Sword of Kings CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Maelstrom's Bolt.
Weapons.Claymore CP: 15: Increases the potency of Northswain's Glow and inflicts Small Max BRV Down for 4 turns.Grants Magical Attack Up to all allies and extends its duration.
Weapons.Defender CP: 35: Increases the potency of Heaven's Wrath and lowers it Action Delay.Inflicts Small Speed Down for 4 turns.Grants Physical Attack Up to all allies and extends its duration.
